result.value:
Caltech Library maintains a list of people, groups and funders and their related identifiers. For many years these were managed using a spreadsheets. That has become cumbersome. **COLD** manages data as JSON objects in [dataset](https://github.com/caltechlibrary/dataset) collections.

**COLD** is implemented as three web web services

- cold web UI
- cold JSON API (provided by datasetd)
- cold reports (the report request system)

Reports are implemented as a set of programs or bash scripts.

TypeScript+Deno is used to implement the web UI and report system.
The JSON API is provided by Dataset's datasetd.
Access control is provided by the front end web server integrated with Shibboleth.

Caltech Library maintains a list of people, groups and funders and their related identifiers. For many years these were managed using a spreadsheets. That has become cumbersome. **COLD** manages data as JSON objects in [dataset](https://github.com/caltechlibrary/dataset) collections. 
TypeScript+Deno is used to implement the web UI and report system.
The JSON API is provided by Dataset's datasetd.
Access control is provided by the front end web server integrated with Shibboleth.

Improved Funder metadata schema. Start integration of ROR data for Funder metadata. Added 'ror_import' to import a ROR data dump zipfile
into 'ror.ds' dataset collection.

result.name: v0.0.31
result.description:
Enabled subjects and doi prefix support. Renamed the dataset collection issn.ds to journals.ds and update source code, templates and paths to reflect that. Added spinner during directory lookup.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/v0.0.30...v0.0.31

result.name: v0.0.30
result.description:
Replace People List A to Z UL with a sortable table version.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/v0.0.29...v0.0.30

result.name: v0.0.29
result.description:
Improved Thesis Option Vacabulary curation. Setup for importing Thesis Options.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/v0.0.28...v0.0.29

result.name: v0.0.28
result.description:
Added Thesis Option Vacabulary generation. Fixed issue with vocabulary generaiton via cronjob by adding a "push_to_cold" option to each vocabulary report.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/v0.0.27...v0.0.28

result.name: v0.0.27
result.description:
Added People Vocabulary generation. Changed cold API query for groups vocabulary to be called group_vocabulary to machine query defined for people vocabulary.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/v0.0.26...v0.0.27

result.name: v0.0.26
result.description:
Turn of CaltechFUNDERS collection, integrated web components into funder view and edit.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/v0.0.25...v0.0.26

result.name: v0.0.25
result.description:
Turned of CaltechFUNDERS collection. Still needs debugging but will be useful for feedback.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/v0.0.24...v0.0.25

result.name: v0.0.24
result.description:
Fix bug in lookup_name SQL call, broke the UI in looking up a clgid from group name. Split it out
to a new function for division_people called `lookup_name_or_clgid`.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/v0.0.23...v0.0.24

result.name: v0.0.23
result.description:
Improved crosswalking division and people to allow using either a division name or clgid in the "division" column of the CSV file.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/v0.0.22...v0.0.23

result.name: v0.0.22
result.description:
- improved display of group information
- added CSVTextarea to manage alternative group names
- added reports for crosswalking group and people
- added reports for crosswalking division and people


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/v0.0.21...v0.0.22

result.name: v0.0.21
result.description:
Fixed bug in get lookupGroupInfo where clgid wasn't getting passed through from query result.
Improved `division_people.ts` so loading division and group data from csv now works.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/v0.0.20...v0.0.21

result.name: v0.0.20
result.description:
Added display of group members on group page.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/v0.0.19...v0.0.20

result.name: v0.0.19
result.description:
Updated CL-web-components to v0.0.5, added `customCleanupFilter` to groups element in people web form.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/v0.0.18...v0.0.19

result.name: Upgrade web components
result.description:
Working proof of concept. Updated COLD with a new version of CL-web-components.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/v0.0.17...v0.0.18

result.name: A to Z lists for People and Groups
result.description:
Working proof of concept. Added A to Z list for lists of people and groups.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/v0.0.16...v0.0.17

result.name: v0.0.16, fixed probem with COR error and client api reference
result.description:
Working proof of concept. Added a groups list to the people object. Fixed client api error and CORS confusion.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/v0.0.15...v0.0.16

result.name: v0.0.15 expands the people object to include group affiliations
result.description:
Working proof of concept. Added a groups list to the people object.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/v0.0.14...v0.0.15

result.name: Added division people report
result.description:
Working proof of concept. Added division people report.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/v0.0.13...v0.0.14

result.name: Added support for Group Vocabulary Generation
result.description: Working proof of concept. Added support for generating group vocabulary file for RDM.

result.name: Directory integration, Journals collection
result.description: This release focuses on Caltech Directory integration browser side.  It also includes cold_admin renamed as cold and the integration of a "Journals" UI and for managing the `issn.ds` collection.  The Journals vocabulary is being generated by cold_reports based on the contents of the `issn.ds` colleciton.

result.name: advisors_id data fix
result.description:
This release adds a script to fix the advisors id missing in our pilot deployment. It also removed some debug output.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/v0.0.10...v0.0.11

result.name: Prototype with reports
result.description: This release is of a proof of concept COLD that supports running reports for some of the managed COLD data.

result.name: Pilot deployment
result.description: This is the pilot deployment of COLD for Caltech Library.

result.name: Work in progress release
result.description: This release is a snapshot of work in progress for COLD.  It includes using dataset 2.1.22 as the backend, TypeScript compiled with Deno for middleware.  It is experimental and subject to changes.

result.name: Snapcraft release
result.description: This release adds the ability to build code as a snap and install via the snap tool. This is an experimental release as cold is still in the proof of concept stage.

result.name: Dockerization release
result.description:
This release is focused on updating the configuration process and making cold "Docker friendly".

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/0.0.2...0.0.3

result.name: Proof of concept
result.description:
This is a proof of concept/minimal viable production demonstration of cold.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold/compare/0.0.1...0.0.2

result.name: Proof of concept
result.description: This release is a proof of concept. A micro service called "cold" is implemented in Go and a human facing UI is implemented as static web content and Web Components maintained as Markdown, Markdown templates, CSS, and JavaScript (including Web Components).

result.name: Test the build and release process.
result.description: This is a test of the build release process for cold.

result.value:
Installation for development of **cold**
===========================================

**cold** Caltech Library maintains a list of people, groups and funders and their related identifiers. For many years these were managed using a spreadsheets. That has become cumbersome. **COLD** manages data as JSON objects in [dataset](https://github.com/caltechlibrary/dataset) collections.

**COLD** is implemented as three web web services

- cold web UI
- cold JSON API (provided by datasetd)
- cold reports (the report request system)

Reports are implemented as a set of programs or bash scripts.

TypeScript+Deno is used to implement the web UI and report system.
The JSON API is provided by Dataset's datasetd.
Access control is provided by the front end web server integrated with Shibboleth.

Quick install with curl or irm
------------------------------

There is an experimental installer.sh script that can be run with the following command to install latest table release. This may work for macOS, Linux and if you’re using Windows with the Unix subsystem. This would be run from your shell (e.g. Terminal on macOS).

~~~shell
curl https://caltechlibrary.github.io/cold/installer.sh | sh
~~~

This will install the programs included in cold in your `$HOME/bin` directory.

If you are running Windows 10 or 11 use the Powershell command below.

~~~ps1
irm https://caltechlibrary.github.io/cold/installer.ps1 | iex
~~~

Installing from source
----------------------

### Required software

- Deno >= 2.3.6
- Dataset >= 2.2.7
- CMTools >= 0.0.33

### Steps

1. git clone https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold
2. Change directory into the `cold` directory
3. Make to build, test and install

~~~shell
git clone https://github.com/caltechlibrary/cold
cd cold
make
make test
make install
~~~
